cab.content: (THIS DOCUMENT IS THE PROPERTY OF HIS' BRITAwNIC MAJESTY1S GOVERNMENT).SECRET. r-/ CABINET.C. P. 169 *CIVILIAN SUBORDINATESROYAL AIR FORCE.Minute from the Chancellor of the exchequer to the Secretary of "State for ""War.(Circulated with reference to Paper No CP. 141)Secretary of State for %r.I regret that I cannot concur in yourproposal to slow down the discharges of civiliansat the depots of the Royal Air Force.It is of course highly undesirable initself and I can see no such necessity for it as would alone justify this addition to the estimates.(Intd.) A.C.Treasury. S.W,20th, November 1919.
